android.car.occupantconnection

接口 CarOccupantConnectionManager.ConnectionRequestCallback

  • 封闭类:
    CarOccupantConnectionManager

    public static interface CarOccupantConnectionManager.ConnectionRequestCallback
    A callback for lifecycle events of a connection request. When the endpoint (sender) calls CarOccupantConnectionManager.requestConnection(android.car.CarOccupantZoneManager.OccupantZoneInfo, java.util.concurrent.Executor, android.car.occupantconnection.CarOccupantConnectionManager.ConnectionRequestCallback) to connect to its peer client, it will be notified for the events. The sender may call CarOccupantConnectionManager.cancelConnection(android.car.CarOccupantZoneManager.OccupantZoneInfo) if none of the events are triggered for a long time.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void onConnected(CarOccupantZoneManager.OccupantZoneInfo receiverZone)
      Invoked when the one-way connection has been established.
      void onDisconnected(CarOccupantZoneManager.OccupantZoneInfo receiverZone)
      Invoked when the connection is terminated.
      void onFailed(CarOccupantZoneManager.OccupantZoneInfo receiverZone, int connectionError)
      Invoked when there was an error when establishing the connection.

    • 方法详细资料

      • onConnected

        void onConnected(CarOccupantZoneManager.OccupantZoneInfo receiverZone)
        Invoked when the one-way connection has been established.

        In order to establish the connection, the receiver AbstractReceiverService must accept the connection, and the sender must not cancel the request before the connection is established. Once the connection is established, the sender can send Payload to the receiver client.

      • onFailed

        void onFailed(CarOccupantZoneManager.OccupantZoneInfo receiverZone,
              int connectionError)
        Invoked when there was an error when establishing the connection. For example, the receiver client is not ready for connection, or the receiver client rejected the connection request.
        参数:
        connectionError - could be any value of CarOccupantConnectionManager.ConnectionError, or an app-defined value

      • onDisconnected

        void onDisconnected(CarOccupantZoneManager.OccupantZoneInfo receiverZone)
        Invoked when the connection is terminated. For example, the receiver AbstractReceiverService is unbound and destroyed, is crashed, or the receiver client has become unreachable.

        Once disconnected, the sender can no longer send Payload to the receiver client.
